nodes.text: Wakiza was a planet located within the Wakiza system of the Core Worlds. One of the original thirteen planets of the Duskhan League, it was located within the Koornacht Cluster that sat on the border of the Core Worlds and the Deep Core of the galaxy. Wakiza was orbited by the Imperial Navy shipyard Black Eight. "Sleepy" Nagelson was shot down while flying a reconnaissance mission over Wakiza for the New Republic.
